name: quark-drive
effect: Boosts the Pokémon’s most proficient stat on Electric Terrain or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.
short_effect: Raises highest stat on Electric Terrain, or if holding Booster Energy.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat on Electric Terrain or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.
